name: Juke Box Lite by KLAP
description:
Juke Box HD

Check out the Exclusive Game Video Trailer

http://goo.gl/j08yK

Juke Box for kids is an awesome collection of dance, sing and play while you learn. Kids can dance to popular rhymes, sing along with popular rhymes and play musical instruments.

Dance – Kids can learn how to put their first step for dancing while they are singing their favorite rhymes. The step by step animation and text is a very nice way to learn dancing.

Play – There are various entertaining musical instruments to amaze the kids. Tap on the drums, bells, tambourine, piano etc. Fun while learning is an essential element, playing with these musical instruments adds fun to this learning activity.

Sing – Kids can sing along with the studio recorded songs from popular rhymes. You can also record their song along with the rhyme played and playback to them. Teach them how to sing and improve their skills.

Awesome application to learn, sing and dance
